title: Tanzawa Sudachi ga Koko ni Iru!
original_name: 丹沢すだちが此処にイル!
sinopse:
When Daisuke entered high school, he found himself sitting next to a rapper! Her name is Sudachi Tanzawa, and while she looked intimidating at first, she's actually has a communication disorder. Thus begins Daisuke's days of worrying about this shy hip-hop girl.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
